GAIN ALL YOUR COLONY BONUSES TWICE: GAIN ALL YOUR COLONY BONUSES TWICE
Draw 3 CEO cards and take one to your ha: Draw 3 CEO cards and take one to your hand, it will be played on your first turn. Discard the other 2.
Once per game, gain 3 M€ for each tile o: Once per game, gain 3 M€ for each tile on The Moon.
Effect: You have +2 score for all awards: Effect: You have +2 score for all awards.
Once per game, draw 10-X awards (min. 1): Once per game, draw 10-X awards (min. 1), where X is the current generation number. You may put one into the game and fund it for free.
Once per game, steal X+2 M€ from each pl: Once per game, steal X+2 M€ from each player that has more M€ than you, where X is the current generation number.
Once per game, place X hazard tiles wher: Once per game, place X hazard tiles where X is the current generation number. Each opponent loses 1 unit of production of their choice, or 2 units if there are 6 or more hazard tiles.
Once per game, increase your plant and h: Once per game, increase your plant and heat production 1 step each. Gain plants and heat equal to your production +4.
Once per game, gain 7-X VP and 4X M€, wh: Once per game, gain 7-X VP and 4X M€, where X is the current generation number.
Once per game, discard any number of car: Once per game, discard any number of cards up to twice the current generation number to draw that many cards.
When you gain a multiple of 5 for any ta: When you gain a multiple of 5 for any tag type IN PLAY, you may pay 3 M€ to draw a card with that tag. Wild tags do not count for this effect.
Once per game, play a card from hand for: Once per game, play a card from hand for 13 + 2X M€ less, where X is the current generation number.
Once per game, gain the Ares adjacency b: Once per game, gain the Ares adjacency bonuses of all player-owned tiles on Mars.
Effect: Ignore placement restrictions fo: Effect: Ignore placement restrictions for greenery and city tiles on Mars.
Effect: Gain 2 M€ when you place a green: Effect: Gain 2 M€ when you place a greenery or city tile on Mars.
When you take an action or play a card t: When you take an action or play a card that increases your TR THIS GENERATION (max 10 times), gain 4 M€.
Once per game, decrease each of your pro: Once per game, decrease each of your productions 1 step to gain 4 of that resource.
ALL OPPONENTS CANNOT TRADE NEXT GENERATI: ALL OPPONENTS CANNOT TRADE NEXT GENERATION. Gain 1 Trade Fleet.
When you take an action that places a ti: When you take an action that places a tile on Mars THIS GENERATION, draw a card.
Once per game, gain all placement bonuse: Once per game, gain all placement bonuses under your tiles on Mars.
Once per game, draw Prelude cards equal: Once per game, draw Prelude cards equal to the current generation number and choose one to play, and discard the rest.
Once per game, pay 8 M€ to draw 3 CEO ca: Once per game, pay 8 M€ to draw 3 CEO cards and choose one to play. Discard this card.
Once per game, draw colony tiles equal t: Once per game, draw colony tiles equal to the current generation number. Put one into play and build a colony on it for free if possible.
Once per game, discard any number of Ear: Once per game, discard any number of Earth cards to draw that many space cards, and gain that many units of titanium, plus 6.
Effect: When you build a colony, gain 2: Effect: When you build a colony, gain 2 energy and 3 M€.
Once per game, move each colony tile tra: Once per game, move each colony tile track marker to its highest or lowest value.
Effect: Gain 1 M€ when any player plays: Effect: Gain 1 M€ when any player plays a Moon tag.
Once per game, increase your M€ producti: Once per game, increase your M€ production by the value of the LOWEST Moon rate.
Once per game, replace the Chairman with: Once per game, replace the Chairman with one of your delegates.
Once per game, replace all Neutral deleg: Once per game, replace all Neutral delegates with your delegates. Gain 3 M€ for each delegate replaced this way. Place 3 Neutral delegates.
Once per game, add 2 floaters to each of: Once per game, add 2 floaters to each of your cards that collect floaters, then add 2 floaters to ANY card. Gain 1 M€ for every 2 floaters added this way.
Ignore global requirements for your Venu: Ignore global requirements for your Venus cards THIS GENERATION. When you play a Venus tag THIS GENERATION, you pay 3 M€ less for it.
Once per game, swap up to X+2 units of p: Once per game, swap up to X+2 units of production between two resources, where X is the current generation number.
Once per game, choose a planet tag. This: Once per game, choose a planet tag. This card counts as having immediately played 2 of that tag. Then gain M€ equal to that tags planety influence track.
Once per game, sell any number of cards: Once per game, sell any number of cards from your hand for 3 M€ each.
Once per game, name a tag. Reveal cards: Once per game, name a tag. Reveal cards from the deck until you find 5 cards with that tag. BUY up to 2 cards and discard the rest.
Once per game, gain 4 M€ for each ocean: Once per game, gain 4 M€ for each ocean placed. If all oceans are aleady placed, gain only 15 M€.
Effect: MILESTONES ALWAYS COST 0 M€ FOR: Effect: MILESTONES ALWAYS COST 0 M€ FOR YOU.
Effect: When any milestone is claimed, g: Effect: When any milestone is claimed, gain 3 M€.
Once per game, add the following resourc: Once per game, add the following resources to your cards: 2 animals, 2 microbes, 2 floaters, 2 wild.
Once per game, gain 2 wild tags for THIS: Once per game, gain 2 wild tags for THIS GENERATION.
Effect: AFTER this action has been used,: Effect: AFTER this action has been used, when playing a card with a requirement, you pay 1 M€ less for it.
Once per game, gain 2 M€ for each Venus: Once per game, gain 2 M€ for each Venus tag in play. Gain an additional 8 M€ if you have the most Venus tags in play.
Once per game, gain all your colony bonu: Once per game, gain all your colony bonuses twice.
Effect: You are immune to Reds' ruling p: Effect: You are immune to Reds' ruling policy.
Once per game, place all of your availab: Once per game, place all of your available delegates in Reds. Gain 1 M€ for each delegate placed this way.
